|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Winbond;W631GG8NB-12; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |ram2type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram2type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram2spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram2size = 4 KiB |ram2chip = Nuvoton;NUC029ZAN;onchip; |ram2_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== "2976616502", "[B1]" and "ZYXEL" are silkscreened on board.
:OEM: [[Delta Networks]]
===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Realtek]] RTL8382M Multi-Layer Managed Switch :Controller with Embedded MIPS 4KEc @500MHz :Co-processor: [[Nuvoton]] NUC029ZAN to manage PoE *Flash/RAM: 16MB (SPI) Flash, 128MB (DDR3) RAM *48Gbps switching capacity, Rack mountable (1U, 19") *12x GbE (RJ45) ports, 12x GbE PoE (802.3at) ports *130W PoE budget
==Links of Interest== [https://download.zyxel.com/GS1900-24EP/datasheet/GS1900-24EP_4.pdf Datasheet]
